title: Child suffers gunshot in Longtown
content:
An 10-year-old boy suffered what appears to be a self-inflicted gunshot from a handgun Friday afternoon, according to Pittsburg County Sheriff Joel Kerns.
The boy is in stable condition and the injuries are not life threatening, Kerns said.
No additional details are available at this time, but the News-Capital will update the story as they become available.
